MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre-arranged work affecting your property in the SY11 postcode area of Oswestry is still ongoing. This is due to a blown transformer after the network was restored and we now expect power to be back on by 7:30pm.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:12pm on 21st April 2021.
